reuters.title: SMITHKLINE BECKMAN CORP 3RD QTR SHR 1.18 DLRS VS 87 CTS
reuters.body: Shr profit 2.77 dlrs vs profit 1.35 dlrs Net 155.0 mln vs 77.4 mln Nine mths Shr loss 1.43 dlrs vs profit 3.66 dlrs Net loss 60.4 mln vs profit 195.2 mln Assets 45.15 billion vs 42.69 billion Loans 36.33 billion vs 34.46 billion Deposits 29.7 billion vs 23.3 billion Reuter 
